page.title: 18BIOGRAPHY OF DENTIST
page.content: THE LOCAL DENTIST, WITH HIS DANISH WIFE AND 2 CHILDREN,LIVES IN AN OLD FARMHOUSE AT LADTHWAITE (ALT. 300m) THE FARMHOUSE WAS BUILT 1600 AND USED TO BE THE CENTRE OF A 400 ACRE SHEEP FARM. HE IS A RESOURCEFUL PERSON WHO HAS IMPROVED WHAT WAS A NEGLECTED PROPERTY AND GROWS HIS OWN VEGETABLES TOGETHER WITH IMPROVING THE ENVIRON- MENT BY CREATING A SMALL PLANTATION NEARBY WITH 10,000 TREES, AND HAS MADE A SMALL POND TO ENCOURAGE WILDLIFE.HE IS ALSO A MEMBER OF THE VOLUNTARY LOCAL FELL SEARCH TEAM WHICH IS PART OF THE NATIONAL MOUNTAIN RESCUE COMM- ITTEE, AND COVERS A WIDE AREA AROUND NATEBY AND KIRKBY STEPHEN.THEY DEAL WITH ABOUT 6 EMERGENCIES A YEAR WHICH INCLUDE RESCUES FROM ROCK FACES, RECOVERING STRANDED SHEEP, SUICIDE ATTEMPTS, BROKEN LIMBS, OR SIMPLY PEOPLE GETTING LOST ON THE FELLS.
